name: Dark Army Survival Test Demo
description:
Hello everyone

Today im releasing for the first time a free test demo of my survival game I started this project about 3 months ago solo, it is still in early development and unfinished, but i do hope i can get some honest feedback about it from you guys.

You started the game, now what? I suggest you press Tab, Navigate to tutorials and read introduction and controls tabs, so you have an idea how to play you will find plenty of information there.

 what can you do? i cant talk about everything in one post, but the short version is, you can gather resources, craft tools/weapons/armors/consumables you can build your house, You can spawn and fight various enemies with parry & dodge mechanics.

 if you navigate to the commands tab this is where you can spawn resources in your inventory and skip grind, as well as control time, spawn AI and so on.

If somehow you get bugged and suicide button doesnt fix it you can try to delete the savefile located at: C:\Users\yourusername\AppData\LocalLow\DarkArmySurvival

There are some things to note about this demo which will change on release: 

The area you play at is very small and limited 

The UI is a placeholder 

Enemies can be easily avoided by building around them (they will not attack buildings)

 AI may get stuck sometimes

 I opened a new discord server if you are interested to join and talk about the game or report a bug

 https://discord.gg/DjrwkfNqvb
